statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Give you a lot of positive integers, just to find out how many prime numbers there are.

statement.title: Input
statement.content: There are a lot of cases. In each case, there is an integer N representing the number of integers to find. Each integer won’t exceed 32-bit signed integer, and each of them won’t be less than 2.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each case, print the number of prime numbers you have found out.
